meanings.definition: To link together in a series or chain.
meanings.sent1: She concatenates the colorful beads to make a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent2: The train concatenates the different cars to form a long line.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel concatenates the nuts in a funny pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling skill concatenates various emotions into a captivating tale.
meanings.sent5: The artist concatenates brush strokes to create a masterpiece on the canvas.

meanings.definition: To combine or merge into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The chef concatenates the ingredients to prepare a delicious soup.
meanings.sent2: The company concatenates its branches to form a global network.
meanings.sent3: The kids concatenate their toys into a giant pile in the playroom.
meanings.sent4: Music concatenates different instruments into a harmonious symphony.
meanings.sent5: The architect concatenates design elements to construct a unique building.
